name: Vam Sat Eco Centre & Saigon South
description:
With a great ride ahead of us we head south
enjoying the fresh cool morning air. Almost right away we are away from the
busy roads and on to quiet hard pack single track lanes. After a while we will
take a well-earned break and stop at a very local shop for some delicious Pho
and an energizing cup of local Vietnamese coffee before carrying on into
evermore rural regions where the trail becomes flanked by fishponds as the main
income generator in these parts and mangrove swamps. we press on  over local ferry crossings, through villages, over
streams, skirting canals saying hello to the friendly residents as we pass by.
